name: Super Loop Bros
description:
(WEB VERSION MAY NOT LOAD, USE THE .EXE INSTEAD)

We have to escape!

Cir-bro and Triang-bro have been trapped into the Looping Hell. They have many differences between each other, but they must colaborate to defeat the polyfoes from the mysterious prison

How to play

You play as cir-bro, and you share a power orb with triang-bro:

  • Move mouse to move
  • Left Click to swap the  power orb's owner (shoot)
  • Right Click to destroy the Loop Cage when Triang-bro is ready

HAVE A GREAT TIME!

CREDITS

-Created by Manuel Rincón for the Wowie Game Jam 4.0
-Music by Open Source Records
